seo.title: Yuniel Acosta | Software Engineer
seo.description: Programmer, writer, technology and science enthusiast, specialized in building web applications. Interested in Vue, Typescript, Node.js, Java/Kotlin and Spring Boot.
seo.ogImageAlt: Yuniel Acosta | Software Engineer - Interested in object-oriented programming, design patterns, functional programming, domain-driven design, and microservices. I am a versatile person with wide-ranging skills, eager to learn, and ready to face new and tough challenges in or out of my country.
